basics.name: Brian Mayer
basics.summary: I'm a software developer, passionate about creating minimalist and efficient software, contributing to open source projects, and venturing into the front-end world. I'm available for hire.
basics.label: Software Developer

work.name: Looqbox
work.summary: Worked as a data scientist and back-end developer at Looqbox, focusing on data science, R, Python, Docker, and Java.

work.name: Poupachef
work.summary: Co-founded Poupachef, worked on cloud infrastructure, micro-services, Android app, and data routines.

work.name: TradersClub
work.summary: Worked as a Golang back-end developer at TradersClub, focusing on payment micro-services, HubSpot, and news mining pipelines.

work.name: Sibros
work.summary: Worked as a Golang back-end developer at Sibros on the fleet intelligence team, focusing on developing data pipelines for e-vehicles.

work.name: Apprenty
work.summary: Apprenty is a Braziliam Edtech startup featuring a chatbot that helps young people get their first job and helps them during their carreer. I was hired to build and deliver their main product. So I developed 2 AWS Lambda services one in Go and other in python, the service turned out to be a custom integration between chatGPT and WhatsApp. The project was successfuly deployed.
